trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Secretary Espinosa.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Minister Livni.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with President Abbas and Foreign Minister Fayyad (November 7). Announced development aid program for Jenin (November 8).

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Attended a Quartet meeting.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Accompanied President Bush to the APEC Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Secretary Miliband.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Attended a NATO Foreign Ministers’ Meeting.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Singh and External Affairs Minister Mukherjee.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with President Zadari and senior officials.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Rasmussen and Foreign Minister Moller.

trip.name: Condoleezza Rice
trip.remarks: Met with President Torrijos and attended the first Pathways to Prosperity in the Americas Ministerial Meeting.
